mapper.select: SELECT rscout.rsc_out_code, rscout.rsc_out_date, rscout.process_perfom_no, rscout.rsc_cd_code, rsccode.rsc_cd_name, rscout.rsc_lot_no, rscout.rsc_out_vol, rscout.rsc_out_cls FROM BF_RSC_OUT rscout LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_RSC_CODE rsccode ON rscout.rsc_cd_code = rsccode.rsc_cd_code WHERE rscout.rsc_out_cls = 1 ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT rscout.rsc_out_code, rscout.rsc_out_date, rscout.vend_cd_code, vend.vend_cd_nm, rscout.rsc_cd_code,rsccode.rsc_cd_name, rscout.rsc_lot_no,rscout.rsc_out_vol,rscout.rsc_out_cls, emp.emp_name, rscout.rsc_out_resn FROM BF_RSC_OUT rscout LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_RSC_CODE rsccode ON rscout.rsc_cd_code = rsccode.rsc_cd_code LEFT JOIN BF_RSC_STOCK stock ON rscout.rsc_lot_no = stock.rsc_lot_no LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_VENDOR_CODE vend ON rscout.vend_cd_code = vend.vend_cd_code LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_EMP emp ON rscout.emp_id = emp.emp_id WHERE rscout.rsc_out_cls = 2 ORDER BY 1 DESC
